variables.scriptBody:
[concat('docker pull ', parameters('externalImage'), '
', 'DIGEST=$(docker inspect --format="{{index .RepoDigests 0}}" ', parameters('externalImage'), ')
', 'DIGEST=${DIGEST##*@}
', 'if docker pull ', parameters('registryName'), '.azurecr.io/', parameters('acrRepo'), '@sha256:$DIGEST 2>/dev/null; then
', '  echo "Image already exists in ACR. Skipping."
', 'else
', '  docker tag ', parameters('externalImage'), ' ', parameters('registryName'), '.azurecr.io/', parameters('acrRepo'), ':latest
', '  docker push ', parameters('registryName'), '.azurecr.io/', parameters('acrRepo'), ':latest
', 'fi')]
